name: 扫黑追缉令 crime cracker
description:
《Crime Crackers》is a first personal shooting (FPS) VR game with a cartoon/realistic style that sets stage in the heart of metro city. In this game, The Black Eagle Organization, as the villain, has infiltrate into every corner of the city. The organization creates a series of hostage crisis and robberies of the Y-Reagent. Under the lead of Captain Zhang, our heroes Jiajun and Xiaomei need to put an end to these evil crimes.


In the game, the player will play as Jiajun and team up with Xiaomei to complete the missions from Captain Zhang. There are total eight chapters in the game. Chapter 1 to 4 take place in the mall and the streets, our heroes need to save the hostages and defeat the robbers of the Y-Reagent. Chapter 5 to 8 take place in the nest of the Black Eagle, players need to destroy the enemy base along with their lab.
